# Field Label

`bal-field-label` is a child component of `bal-field`.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                        | Type      | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `required` | `required` | If `true` a asterix (*) is added to the label text | `boolean` | `false` |
